question: Which country is the major importer of Wollen Yarn from India?
explanation: The major importers of woollen yarn, fabrics and made ups between FY19 were China (US$ 128.96 million), Italy (US$ 46.58 million), Japan (US$ 29.47 million), Korea (US$ 24.77 million), UK (US$ 35.79 million), and the US (US$ 6.83 million).
